column4: Hiya!  I tried Ubuntu a week or two ago (recently switched back to Windows 7 however) and I'm curious if the UI of Ubuntu is supposed to work kind of sluggishly compared to Windows, or if my laptop just can't handle it very well.
Is the Ubuntu GUI designed to run a bit sluggishly compared to Windows, or is that a sign my laptop can't handle it very well?
the GUI is designed to be AWSOME, but sometimes the Fonts Definitions are not quite as expected
